div.p:
Jamys be the grace of god king of scottis to our' aldirman and bailyeis of
our' burgh' of abirdene greting ffor alsmekle' as it complenyeit til ws be
our' luffyt agnes lilburne' the douchtir and air' til vmquhile angus' lil
burne' burges of our' saide burgh that quhar' scho is lachfully entirryt be
coursable' breffis of our' chapell in til a certan lande of sumtyme the saide
angus' lyande within the saide burgh' in the castale gat of that samyn on the
northside of the said castale gat betuix the lande of thomas malyson'
on the west part and the lande of Johne' litstar' on the est syde the quhilk
nocht withstanding the saide agnes can nocht get the saide lande dewoide
and red' til hir' to bruke and Joys' eftir' the tenour' of hir' saysing bot as we
ar informyt it is mayst fully occupiit and inhabit be maryon' the spous' of
vmquhile the saide angus in gret hindering to the saide agnes and contempt of
Justice and law Our' will is and we charge yow that gif it sa be thir' our' lettres
sene' but delay the dewoide and red' the saide lande to the saide agnes and hir'
factouris that we her' na richtwis' complaynt in defalt of administracione of
your' office tharappon' in tym to cum vndir al payn and charge that eftir may folow
the quhilk and ye do nocht we charge yow that ye comper' befor' ws and
our' consaile at perth or quhar' it sal happin ws to be for' the tym the sext
day of Julij next to cum with continuacione of dayis to ansuer' to ws be
caus' ye execut nocht thir' our' lettres and your' office in the saide matir vndir
the paynis forsaide deliuering thir' our' lettres be yow deuly execut agayn to
the berar' Giffin vndir our' signet at perth the xj day of June and of our'
Regne the sewynt yer'

Jamys be the grace of god king of scottis to our' aldirman and bailyeis of our' burgh'
of abirdene greting ffor alsmekile as we haf direct our' lettres of summundis to summunde
yow apon' the vnordirly proceding and serving of a brefe of inquest of our' chapell twe
ching a lande and tenement lying within our' saide burgh of abirdene debatable' betuix
agnes lilburne' on that a part and Johne' lilburne' on that vthir' part to comper' befor' ws
and the lordis of our' consaile the xxj day of Julij next to cum with continuacione
of dayis at perth or quhar' it sal happin ws to be for the saide day Our' will is and
we charge yow straitly and commawndis that ye suffir' maryone' of lilburne wyf
to vmquhile angus of lilburne and modir to the said' Johne' to ramayn with' the
saide tenement on to the tym that it be knawin befor' ws and our' consaile gif the
sayde brefe be vnordirly seruit or nocht and that ye suffir hir' nocht be vexit inquiete
nor strublyt in the samyn lande and tenement and gif that scho be put furth of the
saide lande and tenement in the meyne tym that ye mak hir' to be put in agayn vnto
the tym it be knawin that the said brefe be vnordirly seruit or nocht as saide is
vndir all the hiest payn and charge that eftir' may folow deliuering thir' our' lettres
be yow deuly execut agayn to the berar' giffin vndir our' signet at perth the xij
day of June and of our' Regne the sevint yer'

xiijo die mensis Augusti Johannis de tulydeff seriandus presentauit dictum nigrum
pannum ad forum et crucem appreciandum pro summis supradictis et illo die offerebant
pro vlna eiusdem vj s' testibus thoma quelp et Dauid blabir' burgensibus dicti burgi tanquam
secundo die /

xxmo die mensis augusti anno Domini quo supra Johannes de tulydeff seriandus presentauit
dictum pannum nigrum ad forum et crucem appreciandum pro summis suprascriptis et illo die
offerebant pro vlna eiusdem vj s' testibus matheo fecit et Dauid colyson' tanquam tercio die

xxvijo die mensis augusti anno Dominj quo supra Johannes de tulydeff seriandus dicti burgi
presentauit dictum nigrum pannum ad forum et crucem appreciandum pro summis supradictis quo die
offerebant pro vlnam eiusdem vj s' tanquam quarto die testis Jacobus de Kennardi scissor

In actione mota inter Robertum alexandri et Jonetam burnat dictus Robertus cepit probare
sufficienter dictam actionem infra hinc et xij diem septembris proximum sequens et deficien'
dicta probacione ad diem prefixum remouebat terram dicte Joneta et quitus erit de omni clameo
ipsius Roberti in futurum

Willelmus de ferendracht receptus fuit in liberum burgensem huius burgi ex fauore consilij
pro xx s' soluendis preposito qui prestitit solitum Juramentum /

the profe to be led' be thome of benyn litstar' in the actione movit betuix him and Jamys
andirson' is continuyt with' the consent of bath the parteis forsaide to the law day eftir michal
mes next to cum and than til hafe a full ende perempturly but ony langar delay the samyn
day the saide actione continuit til the samyn xv dayis in sic like ply as it is now in and than til hafe ane
ende and in the meyn tym he sal nocht analy nane of his gudis

Eodem die thomas gray carnifex dedit thomam prat plegium legalem pro se et parte
sua tota quod Willelmus de lammynton et Duncanum de lammytone' et omnes eis adherentes
erunt indempnes de se aliter quam per viam Juris

Eodem modo Willelmus de lammynton dedit Willelmi Willelmum blindsele plegium legalem pro se et
Duncanus de lammynton' dedit Willelmi Willelmum de lammynton' patrem suum plegium legalem pro se
quod dictus thomas erit indempnis de se et parte sua tota aliter quam per viam Juris

Introitus nauis vocate Jacob quam deo gubernat thomas Derikson' de Durdracht
xxvto mensis Augusti anno Domini et ctera lxvto /
Walterus Wan gendirende mercator dicte nauis In primis jC cum dimidio frumenti
Item de saligine et maschlache jC cum dimidio
Item vnum mawnde cum peliis Item vna pipa cum pelijs
Item vj dimidia hamburgh barellas butiri /
Item dimidiumC akin treis
Item iijC cannys

Introitus nauis vocate christofer quam sub deo gubernat clayis martynson' de
Delff et cetera
Willelmus Derikson' mercator dicte nauis In primis jC frumenti Item jC maschlach'
Item ijC malt /
Item iiij last beir' /
Item jC cheis'

Introitus nauis vocate Jacob quam sub deo gubernat butkin laurenson de feir'
In primis jC frumenti
Item jC de le maschlaw
Item xviij barellas s de beir' to vitale and all
Item a barrel saipe
Item a barrel of lynt

Introitus nauis vocate Willybot de armove in selandia quam sub deo gubernat
petir' Janson' de armove / In primis centum salis de baye Item sexaginta barellas
ceporum Item ducentum saliginis cum vna barella pomorum

div.head: Nomina assise

- Androu marr' a pec' blak
Johne' quhythude
- William club a pynt
- thome ymlach' a pynt
- thome baxtar' a par of gluys

- patrik baxtar' a blew kirtill

Nicoll baxtar'
Will sett /

- Wat of striuelingis wyf a quarte
manye s
- William of buchane a ketill
- thome quhitis wyfe a tynnyn stop
- Robert coile // a ketill
thome gardenar'

Introitus nauis petri Wellis vocate christofir de handwarpia et cetera
In primis xx lastas beir'
Item centum salis
Item jM cum dimidio ferri
Item iij quarteris C Wayne scoyte
Item iiijor barellas smigmatis
Item iiijor barellas cineris
Item vnam pipam vini albi
Item jC vlnas panni linei

Introitus nauis vocate Katerina de hundfleit quam sub deo gubernat petyt Johne'
ix ton' and a pip vini
ijC salt mensure flandrie
ijM ferri
vj moye cum dimidio brasij
a bale de ryse

gubernat herman cornelison'
beir' farine
Item gelice dimidium beir' Item ij half barrels butirj

Introitus nauis Robertj Wormot gelice est mercator et habet in eadem naue xiiijxx
quarteris mensure Regne brasij

Clayis Done' vnus marinarius de le plate portum istius burgi fractus fatebatur
se recipisse pro suo feodo et le furyng in dicta naue et pro sepultura virorum submersorum
in dicta naue et pro expensis et laboribus suis in recuperacione de le wraike dicte nauis
in omnibus quatuor libras et octo solidos vsualis monete scocie de quibus adiudicatur
sibi per g henricum hertwitson' pro premissis omnibus tres libr' et octo s' monete predicte
et sic recepit plus xx s' pro quibus replegiauit le wrake dicte nauis gilberto de camera

Copine quhite maystir of the crayer' Johne' Johneson' John berneson'
Comyn Johnson' John court peter quhite William Johnson' William Johneson'
Harnot haruyson thome Karr'

Hewman Williamson maystir of the barge cop pas' hellart rupe pankrage Johnson'
copin hyne mewus Johnson' John of galowgatway per' Johnson' William cornelis
son'

Item the samyn day Androw alaneson' forspekar' for the maystir of the spanye
barge protestyt befor' the aldirman and the bailyeis sittande in Jugement that gif
he cuth' finde her' eftir that cop quhite maystir of the crayer' and hewman Johnson Williamson'
maystir of the barge hade nocht fulfillyt the deliuerance of the assise anent the
gudis that thai hade tane in thair' schippis of the maystir of the spanye barge
attour' his commawndement and bidding sulde nocht turne the saide maystir of
the spanye barge to na preiudice in tyme to cum gif thai hade nocht done'
that thai sulde do eftir the deliuerance of the saide assise for the saide gudis
